Tutorials and Examples
=======================

Quick Start Command
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

In order to run the pipeline, open a shell or bash prompt (or batch script for a job-scheduler) and type:

.. code-block:: bash 

	$ ./saigeBrush myConfigFile.txt
